casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Quintel Martinez AUGUSTINE 130A03-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 22, 2018 Ms. Gretchen Engel, Durham, Attorney at Law, for Augustine, Quintel Martinez Mr. James E. Ferguson, II, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Augustine, Quintel Martinez Ms. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Mr. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, for State of N.C. Mr. William R. West, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 22nd of June 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of June 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 16th day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
